It is no secret that the current COVID-19 pandemic has created a whirlwind of challenges and disrupted the normality of day-to-day life. As such, many businesses have had to make significant changes to their operations to stay afloat and adjust to the “new normal”. Those businesses unable or unprepared to make quick changes are seeing their revenue and customer base erode.
A key sentence that captures the central theme of the text is: "Many businesses have had to make significant changes to their operations to stay afloat and adjust to the 'new normal'."
